title.rendered: Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 In-Ear Headphones with Charging Box, Built-in Microphone, Touch Control, 40 Hours Lasting, 3D HD…

content.rendered:
Key Features

【IPX5 Waterproof】

IPX5 waterproof expertise for each day use, splashes and sweat is not going to injury the headphones. [Attention] Not appropriate for swimming, heavy rain.

【Portable and Long Lasting Charging Case】

Thanks to the low energy consumption, the absolutely charged Bluetooth headphones (just one hour) can provide a playtime of 3-4 hours. The easy and ultra-light charging case can cost the headphones 3-4 instances.

【Touch Control LED Display and Battery】

By touching the contact factors of the headset with your fingers, you’ll be able to choose the final / subsequent track, reply/reject the decision or activate Siri, and many others. The distinctive sensible digital show can simply examine the battery capability.

【One-Step Reconnection】

We adopted probably the most superior Bluetooth 5.0 expertise to make sure a extra steady connection, decrease delay and decrease energy consumption, after paired for the primary time, simply take out the headphones from the charging case and they are going to routinely hook up with your cellphone.

【Comfort Fit + Our Service】

Comes with ear muffs (S/M/L) to make sure the perfect match attainable. PS: Please be at liberty to contact us if there may be any downside with the earphone, we’ll reply you inside 24 hours.

Package contains:

2 x Bluetooth headphones.

Earplugs S / M / L

1 x USB cable.

1 x English handbook.

1 x charging field.
